title: Batucada Sound Machine - Live at The Bowl of Brooklands
description:
At the beginning of 2005 the BSM crew travelled down to the WOMAD festival in Taranaki and played two smoking shows alongside local artists Katchafire and Fat Freddys Drop, as well as international acts Ozamatli, Zap Mama, Alpha Blondy and The Kronos Quartet.

Essentially the best cuts from both shows were chosen for last years popular Live At Womad release that also combined a studio track and two songs from Maori TV.

For this new release BSM have got the spitshine out...

Fresh from Studio 301 mastering studios in Sydney, seven stonking WOMAD tunes have been lovingly and painstakingly re-mixed from the original desk recordings by Andre Upston up at Radio New Zealand, this album is quality.

The horns are bright, drums and bass solid and as a listener you really feel like you could be dancing blissfully in the Taranaki afternoon sun...

Also included is the bonus track Rivers Of Rhyme taken from a special performance at Maori TV on the music show Coast.

100% New Zealand Music
